block.p: Lynne Melissa Bornstein, the daughter of Leslie Bornstein Stacks and the stepdaughter of Dr. Robert D. Stacks of West Newton, Mass., is to be married this evening to William Allen Bermont II, the son of Peter L. Bermont of Miami and the late Ronni W. Bermont. Rabbi Andrew Warmflash is to officiate at the Fairmont Copley Plaza in Boston.
The couple graduated from Duke University, the bride magna cum laude and the bridegroom cum laude.

Lynne Melissa Bornstein, the daughter of Leslie Bornstein Stacks and the stepdaughter of Dr. Robert D. Stacks of West Newton, Mass., is to be married this evening to William Allen Bermont II, the son of Peter L. Bermont of Miami and the late Ronni W. Bermont. Rabbi Andrew Warmflash is to officiate at the Fairmont Copley Plaza in Boston.
The couple graduated from Duke University, the bride magna cum laude and the bridegroom cum laude.

The bride, 26, is a doctoral candidate in French literature at Yale University. In September, she is to become a fellow at the Ecole Normale Superieure in Paris. Her stepfather is the chairman of pediatrics at Faulkner Hospital and is a clinical professor of pediatrics at the Tufts University Medical School, both in Boston. Her mother owns the Bornstein Company in Somerville, Mass., a floor-coverings distribution concern that was formerly owned by the bride's father, the late Robert Zucrow Bornstein.

The bridegroom, 25, is an associate at Divine Interventures, an Internet venture capital business in Chicago. He received a master's degree in management from Northwestern University. His father is a senior vice president and the manager of the Miami office of Salomon Smith Barney, the securities brokerage company.
